name: DeFi Kingdoms
description: DeFi Kingdoms is a cross-chain, play-to-earn MMORPG built on a strong DeFi protocol. The game features DEXs, liquidity pool opportunities, and a market of rare, utility-driven NFTs, which all together create a beautiful, immersive online world in the incredibly nostalgic form of fantasy pixel art.

name: Dexalot
description: Dexalot is a decentralized exchange platform that allows users to trade various cryptocurrencies in a secure and efficient manner.

name: PLAYA3ULL Games
description: PLAYA3ULL Games is a game development studio that creates innovative and immersive gaming experiences for players around the world.

name: Shrapnel
description: Shrapnel is a multiplayer first-person shooter game with realistic graphics and intense gameplay. Join the battle and prove your skills!
